sentences.english: The land is covered in shrubs.
The Xerox is a good office assistant, which you never get tired of using.

sentences.english: Fresh flowers always cover her grave.

sentences.english: The principle of color generation and the theory of optical system design in color xerographic copiers are briefly described in this paper.

sentences.english: Without this bone, the membranous canal is exposed to the overlying dura mater membrane of the brain's temporal lobe.

sentences.english: The invention discloses a metal-based composite medium copper-clad foil plate.

sentences.english: Blades built up laminated hardwood and pine with ply covering overlain by glued fabric.

sentences.english: This is a new xerographic printer.

sentences.english: The cornea is a transparent, dome-shaped structure covering the front of the eye.

sentences.english: As Sessay's funeral, relatives have covered Sessay's face with ritualisticpowder to ward off evil.
